sizes_available: Pattern for Large and Small Snowman
full_text: Free Knitting Pattern for Large and Small Snowmen with Beanie Hats. https://cooldenim.co.uk/index.php/2024/09/16/small-snowme... https://cooldenim.co.uk/index.php/2024/09/05/large-snowma... Both Patterns use stash yarn. White for the body and small amounts of 2 other colours for the hats. An easy knit for Christmas or anytime. Pattern uses 3.5mm needles and DK yarn to give a closer knit for stuffing. They look good in a group and can be personalised to make them different. Content only to be shared with express permission.
